summary: Defines the configuration objects and a fluent builder for constructing evaluation commands within the Raster Vision framework, handling parameters such as data root, evaluators, experiment metadata, scenes, and task specifications, and providing methods to instantiate the command and serialize it to protobuf.
business_intent: Facilitates the setup and execution of model evaluation workflows on geospatial raster datasets, allowing developers to programmatically specify evaluation settings and integrate them into larger machine learning pipelines.
